entry.title: $2679 // ~ 1 BEDROOM ~ BRAND NEW Luxury Building / / / DOWNTOWN BROOKLYN! \ \ \
entry.content:
1 Bedroom in Chic, Impeccably Designed BRAND NEW Luxury Building in Heart of Downtown Brooklyn! Close to so many trains and shopping!

Listing ID #: 254067
Price: $2,679
Property Type: Apartment
Bedrooms: 1.0
Bathrooms: 1.0
Pets: Pets OK

Building Amenities

Doorman
Elevator
Subway
New Construction
Laundry
Bicycle Room
Lounge
Roof Deck
Live In Super

Apartment Amenities

Dishwasher
Granite Kitchen
Hardwood
High Ceilings
Light
Marble Bath
NO FEE
Renovated
Stainless Steel Appliances
Open Kitchen
Microwave

Expansive views and natural light make the surrounding cityscape a part of everyday life. Each homes ample, airy layout integrates modern simplicity with cutting-edge finishes and exclusive details, including beautiful hardwood flooring and brushed steel lighting. The well-appointed kitchens stand out with countertops, brushed stainless backsplash, Fisher & Paykel refrigerator, and Bosch range, microwave, and dishwasher. Bathrooms are outfitted with Grohe fixtures and Kohler cast iron bathtubs.

Desirable amenities include two outdoor common areas to enjoy, along with an indoor lounge and a virtual doorman. A package room will conveniently hold your items. The building is conveniently located steps from the Hoyt Street subway stop, as well as a short, walk away from the Jay Street MetroTech and DeKalb Avenue stops for an easy commute.The building is conveniently located steps from the Hoyt Street subway stop, as well as a short walk away from the Jay Street MetroTech and DeKalb Avenue stops for an easy commute. Its where you want to be: ideally situated with stunning features and amenities that signal a new standard of living in the heart of Brooklyn.

 

Target, Trader Joe's just a few steps away. Come see this BRAND NEW Beautiful building before it's fully rented! 

The A B C F G Q R 2 3 4 5 Subway Lines are all around you. You need to see this new building before it's too late!

* Pictures are of similar units * Incentives Subject to Change * Net Effective Rent advertised after 2 months free on 14 mo. lease

Email: Erez@HillelRealtyGroup.com

Hillel Realty Group
